info.name: Basso M
info.description: A streamlined chair with remarkable sitting comfort, the new Basso is a distinguished family of meeting chairs. Basso creates discreet reliability and even playful ambiance particularly in meeting rooms. It has a lumbar support embedded in the steamlined profile. The upholstered armrest protects the egde of the table top. Basso is available in three sizes (M, L and XL) with a 4-star cross leg (X) or a 5-star cross leg with wheels and gaslift (Z). Optional armrest.
